channel.title: [PI] Help [PI]
channel.description: I'm not sure what i should have put for the title, but How do i make it so.. when you create an account, you will spawn at location X and Y and then you have too talk to this guy, he will tell you the rules, and then when you click accept, he will tele you too the home location?

item.title: [PI] Help [PI]

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 2605; // start here public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3093;
